definition: at or near or toward the stern of a ship or tail of an airplane, situated at or toward the stern or tail of a ship or airplane
details:
adverb
- at or near or toward the stern of a ship or tail of an airplane
= example: at or near or toward the stern of a ship or tail of an airplane
= synonyms: astern
adjective
- situated at or toward the stern or tail of a ship or airplane
= example: situated at or toward the stern or tail of a ship or airplane
